name: Apprentices
description: Cheap and enthusiastic workforce, they can save you a lot of work.

name: Journeypersons
description: Qualified workers who know what they're building but need their smoko breaks.

name: Masters
description: Artisans at the craft, they make perfect things surrounded by finished durries.

name: Workers
description: Operate standard machinery all dayday producing a large quantity of high-quality sex toys

name: Robots
description: Similar to workers. Apparently they don't take breaks but they also tend to break a lot.

name: Cyborgs
description: Humans and robots bow before these half-person, half-machine creations that pump out loads of toys for well... pumping one out.

name: Masters Students
description: Tasked with researching better and more novel ways of building toys they're a cheap and enthusiastic resource.

name: PhD Candidates
description: Focusing on breaking new ground, these students will hopefully develop new theoretical sex toys.

name: Postdoctoral Researchers
description: Experienced and hungry for research grants (and cheap food), these students will do anything.

name: Tenured Professors
description: They cost a lot but will also develop the latest and greatest toys and staff problems.
